# Rotate Rotate subsequent drawing operations around the origin. ## Basic Rotation `draw canvas [ rotate 45 box 0 0 100 100 ]` ## Parameters - **angle**: Rotation angle in degrees ## Rotate Around Point `draw canvas [ translate 100 100 rotate 45 translate -50 -50 box 0 0 100 100 ]` ## See Also - [Transforms](/wiki/graphics/transforms/) - Transform overview - [Scale](/wiki/graphics/transforms/scale/) - Scale transforms
